results.description: After having to cancel two recent friendlies South Africa manage to arrange to host Mali in October.
results.shortTitle: South Africa finally find friendly opponents
results.title: South Africa finally find friendly opponents in Mali

results.description: South Africa name the unheralded Molefi Ntseki as their permanent coach, surprising with a quick decision after the departure of Stuart Baxter.
results.shortTitle: Ntseki appointed as South Africa coach
results.title: South Africa: Molefi Ntseki appointed as permanent Bafana Bafana coach

results.description: Molefi Ntseki is named as South Africa's interim coach after Stuart Baxter steps down as Bafana Bafana boss.
results.shortTitle: Ntseki in as Baxter quits as South Africa coach
results.title: Molefi Ntseki steps in as Stuart Baxter resigns as South Africa coach

results.description: South African former footballer Marc Batchelor is shot dead near his home in Johannesburg.
results.shortTitle: Batchelor shot dead in South Africa
results.title: Marc Batchelor: South African former footballer shot dead

results.description: William Troost-Ekong scores a dramatic late winner to send Nigeria into the Africa Cup of Nations semi-final at the expense of South Africa.
results.shortTitle: Nigeria beat South Africa for semi spot
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Nigeria score in last minute to beat South Africa 2-1 for semi-final spot

results.description: South Africa knock hosts Egypt out of the Africa Cup of Nations and book their place in the quarter-final with a late winner in Cairo.
results.shortTitle: South Africa stun hosts Egypt in Cairo
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: South Africa's late winner stuns hosts Egypt in Cairo

results.description: South Africa defy the odds to knock hosts Egypt out with a late winner and reach the Africa Cup of Nations quarter-finals.
results.shortTitle: South Africa knock hosts Egypt out of Africa Cup of Nations
results.title: Egypt v South Africa live in the African Cup of Nations last 16

results.description: South African super fan Botha Msila made an epic journey to Egypt to follow his beloved Bafana Bafana in the Africa Cup of Nations.
results.title: Afcon 2019: South Africa fan in hitch-hike adventure to Egypt

results.description: South Africa must wait to see if they have qualified for the Africa Cup of Nations last 16 after Morocco score a 90th-minute winner.
results.shortTitle: SA close to Afcon exit after defeat
results.title: South Africa 0-1 Morocco: Mbark Boussoufa scores late winner

thumbnail.altText: Morocco's players celebrate scoring a late winner against South Africa

results.description: Wilfried Zaha scores for Ivory Coast as they beat Namibia to reach the knockout stages.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Ivory Coast join Morocco in last 16

thumbnail.altText: Morocco fans at the Africa Cup of Nations

results.description: South Africa boost their chances of reaching the last 16 by beating neighbours Namibia 1-0 in the Africa Cup of Nations Group D.
results.shortTitle: SA beat Namibia to boost chances
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: South Africa beat Namibia to boost chances of last 16

results.description: Jonathan Kodjia scores the only goal of the game as Ivory Coast edge past South Africa in their opening Group D encounter.
results.shortTitle: Ivory Coast edge past South Africa
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations 2019: Kodjia fires Ivory Coast past South Africa

results.description: Striker Percy Tau believes South Africa can put recent Africa Cup of Nations failures to one side as they seek a big impact in Egypt.
results.shortTitle: AFCON 2019: South Africa's Tau dreaming big
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: South Africa's Tau dreaming big

thumbnail.altText: South Africa Percy Tau vies for the ball with Libya's defender Sanad Al-Warfali in March

results.description: Holders Zimbabwe book a place against Zambia in the semi-finals of the southern African Cosafa Cup with Lesotho to play Botswana in the other semi-final.
results.title: Cosafa Cup: Zimbabwe to face Zambia in semis with Lesotho up against Botswana

results.description: Former South Africa captain Lucas Radebe says the country has lost a "legend" following his compatriot Phil Masinga's death aged 49.
results.title: Phil Masinga: Lucas Radebe leads tributes as ex-Leeds and South Africa striker dies aged 49

results.description: We assess whether Morocco, Nigeria, Senegal or Tunisia could spring a surprise and finally take a team from the continent beyond the quarter-finals.
results.shortTitle: 'Don’t take Tunisia lightly' – can African side upset England?
results.title: Africa 2018 World Cup preview: How will Morocco, Nigeria, Senegal & Tunisia fare?

results.description: Siphiwe Tshabalala scores an incredible goal for hosts South Africa against Mexico in the first game of the 2010 World Cup.
results.title: World Cup countdown: Siphiwe Tshabalala's famous goal opens South Africa 2010
